entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -4.8°C
entry.summary:

Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -4.8°C

Visibility: 1.2 km

Dewpoint: -5.5°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle this evening. Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries beginning near midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
